Public MustInherit Class HtmlControl Inherits Control Implements IAttributeAccessor
public ref class HtmlControl abstract : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IAttributeAccessor
type HtmlControl = class inherit Control interface IAttributeAccessor

summary.span: 在 ASP.NET 網頁架構中定義對所有 HTML 伺服器控制項通用的方法、屬性和事件。

span.span: Defines the methods, properties, and events common to all HTML server controls in the ASP.NET page framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供的所有 HTML 伺服器控制項類別繼承的通用屬性。The class provides common properties inherited by all HTML server control classes. 不會直接建立類別的新執行個體。A new instance of the class is not created directly.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式用來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別使用預設值。This constructor is used to create and initialize a new instance of the class using default values. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別的新執行個體不會直接建立。A new instance of this class is not created directly. 這個建構函式會從其他 HTML 控制項類別，來初始化這個類別中定義的屬性的建構函式呼叫。This constructor is called from the constructor of other HTML control classes to initialize properties defined in this class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||「 跨越 」 常值字串。The "span" literal string.|

summary.span: 取得 ASP.NET 網頁內伺服器控制項標記上所表示，所有成對屬性名稱和值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all attribute name and value pairs expressed on a server control tag within the ASP.NET page.

value.span: 物件，包含 Web 網頁內的伺服器控制項標記所表示的所有屬性名稱和值配對。

span.span: A object that contains all attribute name and value pairs expressed on a server control tag within the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可以用於以程式設計方式存取的 HTML 伺服器控制項的屬性。Use this property to programmatically access the attributes of the HTML server control. 所有 HTML 伺服器控制項都儲存其屬性，在屬性。All HTML server controls store their attributes in the property. HTML 屬性視為.NET framework 所隸屬的 HTML 伺服器控制項的屬性。HTML attributes are treated by the .NET Framework as properties on the HTML server control to which they belong. 如需其他有關的屬性集合的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For additional information on the attributes collection, see the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷的屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the attributes of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlControl.Attributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlControl.Attributes Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlControl.Attributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlControl.Attributes Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Creates a new object to hold the child controls (both literal and server) of the server control.

returns.span: 物件，包含目前伺服器控制項的子伺服器控制項。

span.span: A object to contain the current server control's child server controls.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否停用 HTML 伺服器控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the HTML server control is disabled.

value.span: 如果控制項已停用，則為 ，否則便為 。

span.span: if the control is disabled; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在瀏覽器中，已停用的項目或控制項是唯讀，具有下列新加入的限制： 其值不會提交表單、 項目或控制項無法接收焦點，並瀏覽文件，藉由按下 tab 鍵時略過的項目或控制項。In the browser, a disabled element or control is read-only, with the following added restrictions: its value is not submitted with the form, the element or control cannot receive focus, and the element or control is skipped when navigating the document by tabbing. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式啟用和停用控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically enable and disable an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlControl.Disabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlControl.Disabled Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlControl.Disabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlControl.Disabled Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來存取屬性上伺服器控制項。Use the method to access an attribute on the server control. 所有 HTML 伺服器控制項都儲存其屬性，在屬性。All HTML server controls store their attributes in the property. HTML 屬性視為由 ASP.NET 網頁架構在其所屬的 HTML 伺服器控制項的屬性。HTML attributes are treated by the ASP.NET page framework as properties on the HTML server control to which they belong. 方法的`name`參數不區分大小寫。The method's `name` parameter is case-insensitive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呈現開頭角括弧 (\<)，後面接著控制項的標記名稱、 屬性和右角括弧 (>)。The method renders the opening angle bracket (\<), followed by the control's tag name, attributes, and a closing angle bracket (>). 方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

.property instance bool ViewStateIgnoresCase

summary.span: 取得值，指出 檢視狀態是否區分大小寫。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the view state is case-sensitive.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會覆寫基底類別的屬性永遠傳回`true`，指出該控制項繼承自儲存檢視狀態，而不考慮大小寫。The property overrides the base class's property to always return `true`, indicating that the controls that inherit from save view state without taking case into account.
